50% Off For Life! Plus a $25 VISA GIFT CARD Hurry, good for new orders placed during our promotion!​



Host your own virtual server - run the best and fastest web site software packed with high speed performance, and SEO optimized dedicated IP addresses. Host as many web sites as you want on your own server with instant installation and optimizations for all the popular web site software such as wordpress, Joomla, java, and so much more. Unlimited email accounts, web stats, secure SSL protected web site capabilities and so much more are at your finger tips with your own virtual server.


Please see All Specials for all rules and Limitations of our specials. NOTE: Coupon must be used to place order, coupon details are located at http://www.turnkeyinternet.net/special-offers/



Super Offer! We now include a $25 VISA GIFT CARD + double disk, UNMETERED bandwidth AND double RAM for life on all New orders only placed during this promotion!



Transfer Special: Transfer from another provider by the end of this month and receive double bandwidth. Contact your account executive for full details.

$25 Visa gift card bonus offer applies to annual contract using the coupon on our web site visible at www.turnkeyinternet.net/special-offers/vps-servers/


TurnKey VPS offers Xen powered Virtual Server technology backed by our own wholly owned New York based datecenter, equipment, and U.S. based support team. Our Xen Based Virtualization technology is not over sold, meaning you will have your ram and disk allocated and dedicated to you just like a dedicated server - no over selling!

All TURNKEY VPS's include the following:
  • Xen - No over-selling, all guaranteed resources!
  • Linux or Windows (and custom OS's such as VMWare, Solaris, and more!)
  • 50+ Pre-ready Linux images to choose from
  • 50+ CD-ROM ISO CD discs to install custom operating systems
  • Guaranteed RAM - No burst, no over-sold servers, fully-allocated RAM!
  • RAID-10 ultra-fast disks using SATA III 6 GB/S technology
  • Tier-1 national backbone connections via BGP4 redundant Juniper powered core network
  • TurnKey VPS administration panel access (web-based)
  • Automated reboots
  • Automated OS reloads
  • KVM/console access to all VPS's included free!
  • Licensed installed VPS image versions of Windows Server 2012 and 2008 available
  • Bring your own license versions for Server 2012 and 2008, and Windows XP, Windows 7, and Windows 8
  • Control panels available: cPanel, Plesk, DirectAdmin, & Webmin
  • 1 IP address included
  • Free SmarterTools bundle, an $800 value with Windows VPS packages
  • 100% network uptime guarantee
  • 24x7 toll-free phone, live chat, and help desk support
  • 30-day money-back guarantee
  • NO term contract (month to month)
  • NO setup fees

FREE iPhone app included! Manage your VPS on the go. Reboot, monitor usage, bandwidth, RAM, and more – securely, from the palm of your hand, anywhere in the world!
